summary: Introduced by Representative Ogles and others on January 3, 2025, H.R. 191, titled the "Inflation Reduction Act of 2025," proposes the complete repeal of the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 (Public Law 117-169). The primary objective of the bill is to eliminate the 2022 law in its entirety. It also includes a provision to rescind all unobligated federal funds that were made available under the original act. The bill has been referred to multiple House committees, reflecting the broad scope of the law it seeks to overturn.
